[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Our Treatment

Advanced Cosmetic Injectables

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Bodyful Toronto is proud to offer Advanced Cosmetic Injectable Treatments to our clients. Our professionally trained staff are here to help you safely achieve the look you want.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4270″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Anti-Wrinkle Injections (Botox / Dysport / Nuceiva)[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Neuromodulators are used as treatment for facial lines cause by the repeated use of a facial muscle. They can also be used for other cosmetic purposed like jawline slimming and decreased under arm sweating. Most common area of treatment is frown lines, forehead lines, and around the eyes.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Dermal Fillers (Teosyal / Saypha)[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Restores volume resulting in the reduction, correction and sometimes elimination of facial lines and folds. Fillers also provide lip augmentation and facial contouring.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Platelet Rich Plasma “PRP”[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Injectable treatment where the person’s own blood is used for rejuvenating effect. It can be used in conjunction with microneedling for the face as well as for scalp rejuvenation (hair loss treatment).[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Submental Fat Dissolving (Belkyra)[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]An injectable solution is used to reduce submandibular (double chin) fullness.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Intravenous Treatment[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Special formulations to provide the body with vitamins, nutrients, fluids, electrolytes and anti-oxidants.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4271″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588709087776{padding-top: 107px !important;padding-bottom: 94px !important;}” parallax_background_image=”4151″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8″][vc_row_inner content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Reshape Your Body

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”][vc_column_text]

Body Sculpting Treatments Customized Personally For You

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”] BOOK NOW [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
